Description.Title: PotentialTranspiration (EnergyBalance component)
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson; Glen S. Francis; Derick R. Wilson; Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: This component computes potential transpiration as a fixed fraction of the daily evapotranspiration using a plant cover factor (tau). It reads evapoTranspiration from EnergyBalanceRate and sets potentialTranspiration = evapoTranspiration * (1 − tau), where tau ∈ [0,1] (default 0.9983). The strategy follows the SiriusQuality2 energy-balance formulation within the CRA.ModelLayer framework.
Description.ShortDescription: Calculates potential transpiration as evapotranspiration scaled by (1 − tau), a plant cover factor.
